attributes.title: Say what you will about Trump, but this app is garbage
attributes.review: This is not political. From the second I started using this app is has been crashing and bugging. This is the worst app and should be taken down

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: This was the worst app I have ever downloaded. I could not believe how terrible the quality was. But then I realized I should not have expected anything other than complete CRAP, because it is a Trump app. Therefore, it is the worst app to ever exist.

attributes.title: Smells like a poopy diaper 🤢🤢🤢
attributes.review: I opened the app to find a waft of cry baby poopy diaper floating from my phone I suspect it’s from my man Donald hope this gets fixed 🧐✋ I also found the extreme stench of fascist wafting although idk how this is happening it’s bad :((( hate this app DO NOT GET

attributes.title: Trash
attributes.review: Honestly kinda made me feel obligated to put in my number when I just wanted to see the hot Cheeto mascot. And of course I needed to give out my info like that. Like dawg I don’t want Donald to have my number that’s scary no cap.

attributes.title: Very bad not good
attributes.review: This app is very not good or fun. My IQ is one of the highest so I am very qualified to rate this app. This app is very bad. I will van it from every phone in america AND the united states!!!! Not cool!!!! Makes me want to vom everywhere. Do not download unless it’s to write a bad review that agrees with me.

attributes.title: Don’t get this app
attributes.review: This app is so hard to work with and once I opened it the Cheeto puff was there with his thing out. He was working out and it gives false info. Once it told me that McDonald’s was closing and that’s false.

attributes.title: This app is absolutely horrible
attributes.review: Who would want to get this app, he really just showed me his Cheeto pp to a underage kid, but she was not really good enough for me lol I gotta do you want me you to be like I don’t know if I want you or something I like to do.

attributes.title: No❤️
attributes.review: So first when I opened up the app I immediately freaked out when I saw mr. trumps Cheeto puff(aka his nudes) I was in shock I was in tears almost and it had a white refrigerator I was like oooo- trump come get in this car we finna go find you a house, also Trump 2020 (as in Barron trump😘👍)

attributes.title: i’m scared
attributes.review: I open the app and i slowly started to go brain dead 😦 i could feel my mind closing up and i suddenly hated facts, i started crying my eyes out but then when i deleted it my life got better😌💫

attributes.title: one of the worst apps ive ever used
attributes.review: i bet this man pees his bed every night. he deserves no human rights and is a disgusting little raisin. If you support trump you’re a white supremacist and a r@*e apologist. cant wait til all the old people get wiped out im tired of being in their presence
